game.name: Cars vs Train
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Cars vs Train is a simulation-adventure game, where horsepower is measured to another level. Your mission is not to allow the train to reach its destination before you in order to prevent danger.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Cars vs Train is a simulation-adventure game, where horsepower is measured to another level. Your mission is not to allow the train to reach its destination before you in order to prevent danger.
